girls-night-in.title: Girl's Night In @ the Studio
girls-night-in.tagline: An evening of passion talks & cosy vibes
girls-night-in.description: Bring something you love to share. We'll gather, listen, and practice speaking from the heart.

details.heading: What to bring
details.body: A short presentation (5–10 minutes) on a passion topic of your choice. Could be a hobby, a cause, a weird fact, a book, a place—anything that lights you up.

details.heading: Why 5–10 minutes?
details.body: Practice eloquence. Saying something clearly and with presence is a skill. This is a low-stakes, supportive space to try it.

details.heading: The vibe
details.body: Cosy, curious, no pressure. We're here to listen and learn from each other. Think shared snacks, comfy seats, and good energy.

girls-night-in.cta: Come as you are. Speak from the heart.
